interface.name: seunshare_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute a domain transition to run seunshare.

interface.name: seunshare_run
interface.summary: Execute seunshare in the seunshare domain, and allow the specified role the seunshare domain.

interface.name: seunshare_role_template
interface.summary: The role template for the seunshare module.

param.name: role_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user role (e.g., user is the prefix for user_r).
